wikipedia_page.main: Michael Matus is a British actor.

response: The musical was revived on March 19, 2017, for a limited run at London's Jermyn Street Theatre playing until April 8, 2017. It was directed by Grace Wessels and starred Michael Matus as Dionysos and George Rae as Xanthias.

link_mentions.page: List of alumni of the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art

response: * "Something Kind Of" – Michael Matus & Frances Ruffelle
* "Magic and Mystery" / "Profit and Property" – Frances Ruffelle, Isy Suttie, Michael Matus & Stuart Matthew Price
* "Galloping Galloping" / "The Softness Of Women" (reprise) – Frances Ruffelle & Michael Matus
* "I’m Not A Callous Man" – Michael Matus
